com.optimizely.ab.notification

Class NotificationCenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.optimizely.ab.notification.NotificationCenter

  • public class NotificationCenter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles impression and conversion notificationsListeners. It replaces NotificationBroadcaster and is intended to be more flexible.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  NotificationCenter.NotificationType
      NotificationType is used for the notification types supported.

    • Constructor Summary

      Instantiate a new NotificationCenter

    • Method Detail

      • addActivateNotificationListener

        public int addActivateNotificationListener(ActivateNotificationListenerInterface activateNotificationListenerInterface)
        Convenience method to support lambdas as callbacks in later version of Java (8+).
        Parameters:
        activateNotificationListenerInterface -
        Returns:
        greater than zero if added.

      • addTrackNotificationListener

        public int addTrackNotificationListener(TrackNotificationListenerInterface trackNotificationListenerInterface)
        Convenience method to support lambdas as callbacks in later versions of Java (8+)
        Parameters:
        trackNotificationListenerInterface -
        Returns:
        greater than zero if added.

      • addNotificationListener

        public int addNotificationListener(NotificationCenter.NotificationType notificationType,
                                   NotificationListener notificationListener)
        Add a notification listener to the notification center.
        Parameters:
        notificationType - - enum NotificationType to add.
        notificationListener - - Notification to add.
        Returns:
        the notification id used to remove the notification. It is greater than 0 on success.

      • removeNotificationListener

        public boolean removeNotificationListener(int notificationID)
        Remove the notification listener based on the notificationId passed back from addNotificationListener.
        Parameters:
        notificationID - the id passed back from add notification.
        Returns:
        true if removed otherwise false (if the notification is already registered, it returns false).

      • clearAllNotificationListeners

        public void clearAllNotificationListeners()
        Clear out all the notification listeners.

      • clearNotificationListeners

        public void clearNotificationListeners(NotificationCenter.NotificationType notificationType)
        Clear notification listeners by notification type.
        Parameters:
        notificationType - type of notificationsListeners to remove.

      • sendNotifications

        public void sendNotifications(NotificationCenter.NotificationType notificationType,
                              java.lang.Object... args)
